name: div
features: Athletic Performance Fit: Designed with input from elite players for a modern, tailored fit that combines comfort, durability, & style
Ultra-Premium Fabric: Constructed with four-way stretch material for enhanced mobility & superior comfort during gameplay
Abrasion-Resistant: Engineered to withstand the rigors of a long season with durable, long-lasting fabric
Scotchgard Stain Release: Helps pants stay clean by resisting dirt and grass stains for a fresh look after every game
Moisture-Wicking Material: Keeps players cool & dry during high-intensity moments
Mesh Gussets: Strategically placed in the back thigh, knee, and calf for increased ventilation & added comfort
